.. _`extract_metadata`:

EXTRACT_METADATA
================

Extract a given metadata from a list of yaml files





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_irods_extract_metadata:
        input:
            "metadata.yaml"
        output:
            "extraction.tsv"
        params:
            attributes = ["SampleID", "Condition", "Strand"]
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-225-gb77af9ed/bio/iRODS/extract_metadata"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

Parameters:

* Fields (list): A list of fields to keep
